script.sql: create table power_generation_results ( target_date TEXT not null , generate_amount REAL , consumption_amount REAL , sales_amount REAL , purchased_amount REAL , charge_amount REAL , discharge_amount REAL , constraint power_generation_results_PKC primary key (target_date) ) ;

create table electricity_bill ( year INTEGER not null , month INTEGER not null , total_cost INTEGER not null , basic_price REAL not null , price1 REAL , price2 REAL , price3 REAL , adjust_price REAL , discount_price REAL , re_energy_charge INTEGER , usage_period_from TEXT , usage_period_to TEXT , usage_amount INTEGER not null , constraint electricity_bill_PKC primary key (year,month) );
